explains: v. 组织（organize 的 ing 形式）；使有机化

sentences.en: He's a genius at organizing people.
sentences.cn: 他是人员组织方面的天才。

sentences.en: I've been saddled with organizing the conference.
sentences.cn: 我被派担当组织会议的重任。

sentences.en: He toured the country organizing revival meetings.
sentences.cn: 他巡游全国，组织奋兴布道会。
